input_text:
Job Title: Email / Marketing Automation Manager

Location: Bridgewater Township, NJ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Our client a well-known insurance company is looking for a freelance Email Marketing Automation Manager to join their team for the next 6 months 40 hours/week.

This is a hybrid role onsite Tues, Wed, and Thurs in either in their New York City or Bridgewater NJ office.

Must Haves

 2+ years of managing and leading multichannel marketing automated campaigns Experience using Marketo Salesforce Markting Cloud or Adobe Campaign for email automation Experience using Salesforce

Additional Qualifications

2 to 3 years of experience project managing internal teams including planning and developing campaign based on outlined playbook leading team monitoring progress setting deadlines and ensuring crossfunctional stakeholder alignmentAgile Marketing experience a plusExperience in insurance andor financial services a huge plusBachelors degree in Marketing Communications or related field preferred

Responsibilities

Gather email campaign requirements and manage email intake ensure proper requirements for build deploymentProject manage their B2B and B2C email marketing campaigns based on business requirements and implement predefined campaign automationAct as the subject matter expert on advising business on best practices for email marketing automationDocument campaign performances including benchmarks ROI as well as delivery and open rates, etc.Organize project manage monthly overviews and learning sessions with their global teams

Benefits

Creative Circle's Freelance Employee benefits package includes eligibility for Minimum Essential Coverage (MEC) medical plan, dental/vision/term life package, discount prescription program, critical illness, accident, tele-behavioral health, and 401(k) plan. Sick leave is provided to Candidates whose assignment work location is in a state or city subject to sick leave laws. A Minimum Value (MV) PPO medical plan, Employee Stock Purchase Plan, and paid holiday eligibility are based on length and dates of service.

Email Your Resume In Word To

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

msharma@creativecircle.com

Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : MH14-1794877L317 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***

Meggan Sharma - Recruiter, National Delivery - CyberCoders

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

CreativeCircle is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, genetic information, registered domestic partner status, marital status, status as a crime victim, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. CreativeCircle will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable law. CreativeCircle is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with physical and mental disabilities. If you need special assistance or an accommodation while seeking employment, please contact a member of our Human Resources team to make arrangements.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
